title: IBM security advisory (AV25-157)
description: Between March 17 and 23, 2025, IBM published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were critical updates for the following products:
products: DataStage on Cloud Pak for Data   version 4.8.2 to 4.8.4
IBM Maximo Application Suite IoT Component   versions 8.7, 8.8 and 9.0
IBM watsonx Assistant Cartridge   version 4.0 to 5.1.0
IBM watsonx Orchestrate with watsonx Assistant Cartridge - Assistant Builder Component   version 5.0 to 5.1.0
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
